### runOpWithExpandOnOverflow() {#a260fae637de414fe27ae28483df4f379}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>APInt runOpWithExpandOnOverflow (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp; B, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;, bool &amp;Overflow)&gt; Op)</>}>
Bring a and b to have the same width and then call <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op(a, b, overflow)</a>.

<hr/>
 

<Link id="details" />


## Arithmetic operators



If the overflow bit becomes set, resize a and b to double the width and call <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op(a, b, overflow)</a>, returning its result. The operation with double widths should not also overflow.

Definition at line <a href="#l00159">159</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/slowdynamicapint-cpp">SlowDynamicAPInt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This operation cannot overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
